title: Provides that residential health care facilities may return and redistribute unused medication
summary: Provides that residential health care facilities may return and redistribute unused medication provided that such medication is in the manufacturer's original, tamper evident packaging; directs the commissioner of health to establish a reasonable fee of reimbursement of costs related to the receipt, restocking and redistribution of such medication payable to the pharmacy to which such medication is returned.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to return and redistribution of unused medication
